title: Top hashtags used by U.S. Congress Democrats in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Hashtag in the x axis and Total number of mentions in the y axis.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
The Total number of mentions of Hashtag #hr1 is 4.14% smaller than the maximum value at #forthepeople.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hashtag, and Total number of mentions in each Hashtag on the y axis.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hashtag in the x axis and Total number of mentions in the y axis.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
The Total number of mentions of Hashtag #hr1 is 4.14% smaller than the maximum value at #forthepeople.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total number of mentions for 10 number of Hashtags.
The Total number of mentions is highest at Hashtag #forthepeople and lowest at Hashtag #hr1.
The highest Hashtag #forthepeople has 5278.0 more Total number of mentions than the lowest Hashtag #hr1.
The Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions, followed by #trumpshutdown, and #protectourcare. Down to the Hashtag #hr1 which is the lowest.
Hashtag #hr8, and #actonclimate have the same Total number of mentions.
The lowest value 1683.0 at #hr1 is almost 2.54 times smaller than the average value 2745.6.
